Mini Normal 1449 - Ordinary Town

Moderator:qwints
Back-up Moderator: Messiah
Reviewers: Regfan, Vi, and xRECKONERx

Welcome to Ordinary Town. Unfortunately, you've arrived the night of a rather extraordinary event. A beloved ordinary person has been found dead, and you're one of the suspects. The people of the town have locked you in a room and told you that no one is allowed to leave until you have identified the wrong doers.

At least one of you has received the following, rather ordinary, role pm:

You are a Vanilla Townie. Your only abilities are your voice and your vote. You win if at least one town player is alive and all threats to the town are eliminated.


General Rules
1. This is a Normal Game.
2. All site-wide rules apply.
3. Punishments for violating the rules may include, but are not limited to: forced replacement or mod-killing.
4. Pretending to break the rules is the same as breaking the rules.

Post Restrictions
1. This is my color. Don't use it.
2. No posting after your lynch scene has been posted. No exceptions.
3. No cryptography or tiny text.

Activity Requirements
1. By confirming in thread, you commit to participating in this game.
2. You must, unless you give prior notice of V/LA, post once every 73 hours.
3. Failure to post regularly will result in a prod by pm.
4. Repeated proddings or failure to respond to a prod in a timely fashion will result in replacement.

Voting and deadlines
1. All votes should be in this form - VOTE: Player. Players may also UNVOTE: Player or VOTE: "No lynch"
2. Anything that looks likes a vote may be counted as a vote at my discretion.
3. At the beginning of each day, I will announce a 2 week deadline. This deadline may be extended once at my discretion to account for replacements.
4. Once a player has reached at least 50% + 1 vote, a lynch has been reached. Votes and unvotes will not be effective.
5. Once deadline is reached without a majority, no lynch will occur.
6. When a player is lynched or nightkilled, their role name and alignment will be revealed.

Endgame decisions
1. These rules are generic and are not meant to imply that any particular role is in a game.
2. Serial killers win if every other player is dead. They do not have to survive to win.
3. Mafia wins if at least one mafia player is alive and no other faction has any living players left or nothing can prevent that.
4. Town wins if at least one town player is alive and all threats to the town are eliminated.
